ARABIC: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ يَأْتُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ مُذْعِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But if right is on their side, they come to him most submissively!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Had right been on their side they would have come to him submissively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: However, if the truth be on their side, they come towards the Messenger in all obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If right was on their side, they would come quickly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if the judgement is in their favour, they come towards it willingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But if the truth is on their side, they come to him willingly with submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if the truth be on their side, they come to him quickly, obedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but if they are in the right, they will come to him submissively.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But if right had been with them they would have come unto him willingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But if the truth happens to be to their liking, they are quite willing to accept it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if right had been theirs, they would have come to him readily.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But if justice be on their side, they come compliantly to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But if the right is on their side, they come to him with all submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But if the right is with them, they come to him willingly with submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If the right is theirs, they would have hastened to him obediently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if justice is on their side, they accept it willingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But if the right is theirs, they come to him in prompt obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:49] But if right be on their side they would come to him willingly, hastening compliantly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But if right had been with them) with the people of 'Uthman (they would have come unto him) to the Prophet (pbuh) (willingly) in haste and obediently.
